attributes.action: Require the driving theory test as a pre-requisite for a provisional licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As well as the graduated driving test suggested on some other petitions, I would add that the theory test should be taken BEFORE a student driver begins driving. I suggest that the theory test is the first stage in learning to drive, and only when that is passed can the learner begin taking lessons in a car.  

I also suggest that the test centres themselves issue the licenses immediately after the test is complete, so they can take the photo and check eyesight etc, which is currently self-assessed online!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
